--- select_literals_array.sql
SELECT
  [1, 2, 3],
  ['x', 'y', 'xy'],
  ARRAY[1, 2, 3],
  ARRAY<string>['x', 'y', 'xy'],
  ARRAY<int64>[]

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*ast.Hint)(nil),
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Select:   0,
    Distinct: false,
    As:       nil,
    Results:  []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.ArrayLiteral{
          Array:  -1,
          Lbrack: 9,
          Rbrack: 17,
          Type:   nil,
          Values: []ast.Expr{
            &ast.IntLiteral{
              ValuePos: 10,
              ValueEnd: 11,
              Base:     10,
              Value:    "1",
            },
            &ast.IntLiteral{
              ValuePos: 13,
              ValueEnd: 14,
              Base:     10,
              Value:    "2",
            },
            &ast.IntLiteral{
              ValuePos: 16,
              ValueEnd: 17,
              Base:     10,
              Value:    "3",
            },
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.ArrayLiteral{
          Array:  -1,
          Lbrack: 22,
          Rbrack: 37,
          Type:   nil,
          Values: []ast.Expr{
            &ast.StringLiteral{
              ValuePos: 23,
              ValueEnd: 26,
              Value:    "x",
            },
            &ast.StringLiteral{
              ValuePos: 28,
              ValueEnd: 31,
              Value:    "y",
            },
            &ast.StringLiteral{
              ValuePos: 33,
              ValueEnd: 37,
              Value:    "xy",
            },
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.ArrayLiteral{
          Array:  42,
          Lbrack: 47,
          Rbrack: 55,
          Type:   nil,
          Values: []ast.Expr{
            &ast.IntLiteral{
              ValuePos: 48,
              ValueEnd: 49,
              Base:     10,
              Value:    "1",
            },
            &ast.IntLiteral{
              ValuePos: 51,
              ValueEnd: 52,
              Base:     10,
              Value:    "2",
            },
            &ast.IntLiteral{
              ValuePos: 54,
              ValueEnd: 55,
              Base:     10,
              Value:    "3",
            },
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.ArrayLiteral{
          Array:  60,
          Lbrack: 73,
          Rbrack: 88,
          Type:   &ast.SimpleType{
            NamePos: 66,
            Name:    "STRING",
          },
          Values: []ast.Expr{
            &ast.StringLiteral{
              ValuePos: 74,
              ValueEnd: 77,
              Value:    "x",
            },
            &ast.StringLiteral{
              ValuePos: 79,
              ValueEnd: 82,
              Value:    "y",
            },
            &ast.StringLiteral{
              ValuePos: 84,
              ValueEnd: 88,
              Value:    "xy",
            },
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.ArrayLiteral{
          Array:  93,
          Lbrack: 105,
          Rbrack: 106,
          Type:   &ast.SimpleType{
            NamePos: 99,
            Name:    "INT64",
          },
          Values: []ast.Expr(nil),
        },
      },
    },
    From:    (*ast.From)(nil),
    Where:   (*ast.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT [1, 2, 3], ["x", "y", "xy"], ARRAY[1, 2, 3], ARRAY<STRING>["x", "y", "xy"], ARRAY<INT64>[]
